name: Spaceship Operating System
description:
Spaceship flight school can only prepare you for so much. When everything goes wrong, and you've misplaced your main manual, you'll have to rely on your own wits to get yourself back to safety.

Note: You MUST look at the manual in order to win the game! The manual can be downloaded below.

You can contact me at avarragon (at) gmail (dot) com. I'd love to hear feedback.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2015.

I haven't tested the Linux or Mac versions of the game, so let me know if there's an issue.
